directions: Brown chops in skillet. Remove chops from skillet and drain grease. Put chops back in skillet and pour sour cream and soup over them.  Let simmer for 1 hour, turning every 15 minutes or so.
ingredients: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed cream of mushroom soup
title: Pork Chops with Sour Cream and Mushroom Sauce
